title: cherielle
description: cherielle is a 501(c)(3) youth-led nonprofit that strives to 1) bridge the gender gap, 2) empower girls in computer science, and 3) foster a connected, impactful community. Not only do we post about tech, but we offer CS tutoring in several languages & AP CSA prep. We also provide lots of other resources for opportunities and initiatives!

title: STEM by Step
description: A free STEM education platform providing hands-on learning experiences and project-based curriculum for underserved communities.

title: Hearts of Tomorrow
description: Empowering youth through mentorship, leadership development, and community service opportunities.
